metadata.description: Realistic cybersecurity analyst questions based on factual events
metadata.purpose: Evaluate RAG system with realistic analyst questions

ground_truth.question: What time did the narrator shut down their work laptop on Monday evening?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for Monday evening activities and laptop shutdown time

ground_truth.question: What time did the narrator go to bed on Monday night?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for Monday night bedtime

ground_truth.question: What time did the staging-3 server reboot occur?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for staging-3 reboot time in system logs

ground_truth.question: What time did Kiera send the Slack message about the build runner?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for Kiera's Slack message timestamp

ground_truth.question: What time did the suspicious file get copied to multiple machines?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for time when logi_loader.dll was copied

ground_truth.question: What time did sharris's account first authenticate successfully?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for sharris authentication times

ground_truth.question: What time did jmalik connect to the VPN?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for jmalik VPN connection time

ground_truth.question: What time were the earliest DNS requests detected?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for earliest DNS activity time

ground_truth.question: What time did the incident response team finish working on Tuesday?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for when they stopped working on Tuesday

ground_truth.question: What time did the narrator leave the office on Tuesday?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for when the narrator left the office

ground_truth.question: What time did the narrator arrive at the office on Wednesday?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for Wednesday morning arrival time

ground_truth.question: What was the name of the suspicious DLL file?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for the suspicious file name

ground_truth.question: What file had its permissions changed before the reboot?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for file permission changes on staging-3

ground_truth.question: What was the label on the USB stick found in the training PC?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for USB stick label

ground_truth.question: What domain was used for data exfiltration?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for the domain used for outbound traffic

ground_truth.question: What domain was mentioned alongside updates-status-sync.live?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for domains mentioned with updates-status-sync.live

ground_truth.question: What VPN server did jmalik connect to?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for jmalik's VPN connection details

ground_truth.question: Which server showed malformed packets from switch sw-07b?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for server with malformed packets from sw-07b

ground_truth.question: What was the total amount of outbound traffic detected?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for data volume measurements

ground_truth.question: Which security engineer was contacted about the suspicious logins?
ground_truth.context_hint: Look for security engineer name
